channel.title: Pk drops?
channel.description: ok ive looked everywhere on how to make actual drops in pvp for a 317 and 508 if any1 could help me out ill relly apreciate it :D

item.title: Pk drops?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

ooh… you coulda said that you didnt want pvp drops, hold on ill get you the code.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 10, 2009, 09:22:11 pm[/size][hr] ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[rr]-1, getItemSlot(playerItems[rr]-1), playerItemsN[rr], absX, absY, 1, KillerId, false);

delete all the other ItemHandler.addItem(Waffles) and paste that just once, tell me if it works.

item.title: Pk drops?
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

very simple…

change your line to drop a set list of items instead of all player items etc.

if you want, server downloads>search>prodigyscape download it, open up client.java search “waffle” and the paragraph you will see shows that it drops 1 item from a file called Items.java (not items.cfg with item stats etc), from a set list of items, so go to Item.java search waffle and you’ll see lists of items, use that concept.

Read full topic
